changeSet.author: ywang
changeSet.comment: Update Resolution Status Ids of Parent DNs As Their Last Child
changeSet.sql: update discrepancy_note dn set resolution_status_id = ( select cdn.resolution_status_id from discrepancy_note cdn where dn.discrepancy_note_id = cdn.parent_dn_id and cdn.discrepancy_note_id = ( select max(idn.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note idn where idn.parent_dn_id = cdn.parent_dn_id ) ) where dn.parent_dn_id isNull

changeSet.author: ywang
changeSet.comment: Create or Replace a View DN_DAYS
changeSet.sql: create or replace view DN_AGE_DAYS as select dn.discrepancy_note_id, (case when dn.resolution_status_id in (1,2,3) then current_date - (select cdn.date_created from discrepancy_note cdn where cdn.discrepancy_note_id = ( select max(idn.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note idn where idn.parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id)) end) as days, (case when dn.resolution_status_id = 4 then ( (select cdn.date_created from discrepancy_note cdn where cdn.discrepancy_note_id = ( select max(idn.discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note idn where idn.parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id) ) - dn.date_created) when dn.resolution_status_id in (1,2,3) then (current_date - dn.date_created) end) as age from discrepancy_note dn where dn.parent_dn_id isNull
